3FBA74BE.Line5.1029AF: It was a cruel death, it's no wonder some refused to pass on.

6736CAFC.Line3.1029AF: Years later, the asylum was abandoned. The lucky ones are said to have starved, while the rest escaped their cells only to fight each other.

8EB3213A.Line1.1029AF: When they found out what he did, they put him in irons and carried him off to the Black Asylum.
